titles.title: To suspend temporarliy the duty on NORBLOC 7966.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on 2-(2'-hydroxy-5'-methylacryloxyethylphenyl)-2H-benzotriazole (NORBLOC 7966) (CAS No. 96478-09-0), in bulk active form.
